title: Tomato and Egg Salad
introduction: Savor the fresh and vibrant flavors of summer with this delectable Tomato and Egg Salad. This classic Sicilian dish combines juicy tomatoes, perfectly cooked eggs, and fragrant basil, creating a light yet satisfying meal. Perfect for lunch on a warm day, this salad can also be enjoyed in a sandwich for a delightful twist.
ingredients: 2 large ripe tomatoes, cut into wedges
6 fresh basil leaves, stacked and cut into thin ribbons
Salt and freshly ground black pepper
instructions: Place the eggs in a small saucepan with cold water to cover. Bring the water to a simmer. Cook for 12 minutes. Let the eggs cool under cold running water. Drain and peel. Cut the eggs into quarters.
In a large bowl, combine the eggs, tomatoes, green onions, and basil.
In a small bowl, whisk together the oil, vinegar, and salt and pepper to taste. Pour the dressing over the salad and toss gently. Serve immediately.
